title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file from the outline image and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image is not being refreshed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and displayed correctly in the layout view after importing it again.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Verify that the image is refreshed and displayed correctly in the layout view.
